Key Match Events: India managed to tie the match with Sri Lanka but lost all their wickets
Axar Patel and KL Rahul scored some valuable runs
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka took three wickets each
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second ODI will take place on Sunday from the same stadium in Colombo
Others: Asrshdeep Singh and Axar Patel took two wickets each
Mohammed Siraj, Shivam Dube, Kuldeep Yadav and Washington Sundar picked one wickeyt each
Sri Lanka skipper Charith Asalanka won the toss and opted to bat first at the R Premadasa stadium in Colombo
India and Sri Lanka squads were provided
